comments.body:
The `host` section should only contain dependencies which are needed to run `setup.py`.

Are these all needed or can some of them be removed? (`jsonschema`, `matplotlib`, `scipy` and probably some of the others)

Those dependencies are passed to setup() in setup.py, trough the *requirements* keyword. If we  don't include them conda-build gives the following error: 

`RuntimeError: Setuptools downloading is disabled in conda build. Be sure to add all dependencies in the meta.yaml`
